Visual communications technology

The Visual Arts Programs provides the essential foundation in studio art and design, graphic design, animation, photography and art history. We offer both college-transfer and career training, with classes taught by knowledgeable and dedicated instructors to focus your ambition in building a portfolio. Our state-of-the-art facilities set the tone for academic excellence. Paired with this is the option to start any quarter and our programâ€™s affordable tuition (roughly one-third the tuition of other competitive schools).

Non-Transfer Associate Degrees

  • Animation/video for multimedia (AAAS)
  • Creative project management (AAAS)
  • Game and art design (AAAS)
  • Graphic design (AAAS)
